dcterms:description: The MZ dataset was collected from the Baidu Muzhi Doctor website. This dataset contains 710 dialogue goals that involve 4 types of diseases (infantile diarrhea, children functional dyspepsia, upper respiratory infection and children’s bronchitis) and 66 types of symptoms. Each dialogue goal contains the actual result of diagnosis, the symptoms in the patient’s self-report, and the symptoms obtained by conversing with the patient. The sizes of the training set and test set are 568 and 142, respectively.
dcterms:title: MZ dataset

dcterms:creator: L. Xu
Q. Zhou
K. Gong
X. Liang
J. Tang
L. Lin
dcterms:description: The DX dataset was collected from an online health-care website (dxy.com). It contains 527 real medical diagnosis dialogues. The DX dataset covers five diseases (pneumonia, allergic rhinitis, upper respiratory infection, diarrhea, and hand-foot-mouth disease) and 41 symptoms. 423 dialogues are selected for training models, and the remaining 104 dialogues are regarded as the test set.
dcterms:title: DX dataset
